## R Markdown

```{r}
library(tidycensus)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)

pums_var_2020 <- pums_variables %>% filter(year == 2020, survey == "acs5")
View(pums_var_2020)

X = pums_var_2020 %>% 
  filter(var_code == "DIS")
View(X)

vt_pums <- get_pums(
  variables = "AVAILBLE",
  state = "IA",
  survey = "acs5",
  year = 2020
  )
View(vt_pums)

```


Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
